data.name: AssemblyNotFound
data.value: For the app startup parameter value '{0}', the assembly '{1}' was not found.

data.name: ClassNotFoundInAssembly
data.value: For the app startup parameter value '{0}', the class '{1}' was not found in assembly '{2}'.

data.name: Exception_AppLoderFailure
data.value: The following errors occurred while attempting to load the app.

data.name: Exception_AttributeNameConflict
data.value: The OwinStartup attribute discovered in assembly '{0}' referencing startup type '{1}' conflicts with the attribute in assembly '{2}' referencing startup type '{3}' because they have the same FriendlyName '{4}'. Remove or rename one of the attributes, or reference the desired type directly.

data.name: Exception_AuthenticationTokenDoesNotProvideSyncMethods
data.value: The AuthenticationTokenProvider's required synchronous events have not been registered.

data.name: Exception_CannotRegisterAfterHeadersSent
data.value: Cannot register for 'OnSendingHeaders' event after response headers have been sent.

data.name: Exception_ConversionTakesOneParameter
data.value: Conversion delegate must take one parameter.

data.name: Exception_CookieLimitTooSmall
data.value: The cookie key and options are larger than ChunksSize, leaving no room for data.

data.name: Exception_DefaultDpapiRequiresAppNameKey
data.value: The default data protection provider may only be used when the IAppBuilder.Properties contains an appropriate 'host.AppName' key.

data.name: Exception_DuplicateKey
data.value: The key '{0}' is already present in the dictionary.

data.name: Exception_HowToDisableAutoAppStartup
data.value: To disable OWIN startup discovery, add the appSetting owin:AutomaticAppStartup with a value of "false" in your web.config.

data.name: Exception_HowToSpecifyAppStartup
data.value: To specify the OWIN startup Assembly, Class, or Method, add the appSetting owin:AppStartup with the fully qualified startup class or configuration method name in your web.config.

data.name: Exception_ImcompleteChunkedCookie
data.value: The chunked cookie is incomplete. Only {0} of the expected {1} chunks were found, totaling {2} characters. A client size limit may have been exceeded.

data.name: Exception_MiddlewareNotSupported
data.value: The type '{0}' does not match any known middleware pattern.

data.name: Exception_MissingDefaultSignInAsAuthenticationType
data.value: A default value for SignInAsAuthenticationType was not found in IAppBuilder Properties. This can happen if your authentication middleware are added in the wrong order, or if one is missing.

data.name: Exception_MissingOnSendingHeaders
data.value: The OWIN key 'server.OnSendingHeaders' is not available for this request.

data.name: Exception_NoConstructorFound
data.value: The class '{0}' does not have a constructor taking {1} arguments.

data.name: Exception_NoConversionExists
data.value: No conversion available between {0} and {1}.

data.name: Exception_PathMustNotEndWithSlash
data.value: The path must not end with a '/'

data.name: Exception_PathMustStartWithSlash
data.value: The path must start with a '/' followed by one or more characters.

data.name: Exception_PathRequired
data.value: The path is required

data.name: Exception_QueryStringMustStartWithDelimiter
data.value: The query string must start with a '?' unless null or empty.

data.name: Exception_StartupTypeConflict
data.value: The discovered startup type '{0}' conflicts with the type '{1}'. Remove or rename one of the types, or reference the desired type directly.

data.name: Exception_UnhookAuthenticationStateType
data.value: The state passed to UnhookAuthentication may only be the return value from HookAuthentication.

data.name: Exception_UnsupportedPipelineStage
data.value: The given stage '{0}' is not supported.

data.name: FriendlyNameMismatch
data.value: The OwinStartupAttribute.FriendlyName value '{0}' does not match the given value '{1}' in Assembly '{2}'.

data.name: HttpContext_OwinEnvironmentNotFound
data.value: No owin.Environment item was found in the context.

data.name: MethodNotFoundInClass
data.value: No '{0}' method was found in class '{1}'.

data.name: NoAssemblyWithStartupClass
data.value: No assembly found containing a Startup or [AssemblyName].Startup class.

data.name: NoOwinStartupAttribute
data.value: No assembly found containing an OwinStartupAttribute.

data.name: StartupTypePropertyEmpty
data.value: The OwinStartupAttribute.StartupType value is empty in Assembly '{0}'.

data.name: StartupTypePropertyMissing
data.value: The type '{0}' referenced from assembly '{1}' does not define a property 'StartupType' of type 'Type'.

data.name: Trace_ClientCertException
data.value: An exception was thrown while trying to load the client certificate:

data.name: Trace_OwinCallContextCallbackException
data.value: The IAsyncResult callback for OwinCallHandler threw an exception:

data.name: Trace_RequestDisconnectCallbackExceptions
data.value: The application threw one or more exceptions when notified of a client disconnect:

data.name: Trace_ShutdownDetectionSetupException
data.value: Shutdown detection setup failed:

data.name: Trace_ShutdownException
data.value: One or more exceptions were thrown during app pool shutdown:

data.name: Trace_WebSocketException
data.value: An exception was thrown while processing the WebSocket:

data.name: Trace_WebSocketsSupportDetected
data.value: Support for WebSockets has been detected.

data.name: Trace_WebSocketsSupportNotDetected
data.value: No support for WebSockets has been detected.

data.name: TypeOrMethodNotFound
data.value: The given type or method '{0}' was not found. Try specifying the Assembly.

data.name: UnexpectedMethodSignature
data.value: The '{0}' method on class '{1}' does not have the expected signature 'void {0}(IAppBuilder)'.
